Class SimpleTextCard

java.lang.Object

      com.qualcomm.toq.smartwatch.api.v1.deckofcards.card.SimpleTextCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Parcelable
public class SimpleTextCard
extends Card

A simple text based implementation of a Card for use with a DeckOfCards.

Author:
mcaunter
See Also:
DeckOfCards

SimpleTextCard

public SimpleTextCard(String id,
                      String headerText,
                      long timeMillis,
                      String titleText,
                      String[] messageText)
Constructs a card with the specified values, receiving events disabled and show divider disabled.

Parameters:
id - the card id
headerText - the header text
timeMillis - the time millis
titleText - the title text
messageText - the message text

isShowDivider

public boolean isShowDivider()
Returns whether the Toq smartwatch should draw a divider between lines of text when this card is rendered.

Returns:
true if drawing the divider; false if not
